description:
Job Title: Senior Buyer I

Reports to: Head of Merchandise

Job Location: Los Angeles, CA, USA

Job Status: Exempt


About SHEIN

SHEIN is a global online fashion and lifestyle retailer, offering SHEIN branded apparel and products from global network of vendors, all at affordable prices. Headquartered in Singapore, SHEIN remains committed to making the beauty of fashion accessible to all, promoting its industry-leading, on demand production methodology, for a smarter, future-ready industry. Founded in 2012, SHEIN has more than 16,000 employees operating from offices around the world, and continues to expand operations globally. Join SHEIN and be the future!


Position Summary

We’re seeking a full-time Senior Buyer for our Los Angeles-based corporate office. The Senior Buyer for women’s apparel will be responsible for identifying suppliers, researching goods and services, processing purchase orders, and verifying delivered items. You will work cross-functionally with the creative team and will have the opportunity to launch new categories and extend product lines. You will also be a mentor and provide guidance to the Assistant Buyers. Our ideal candidate is fluent in the latest trends and hyper-aware of top brands in the women’s apparel category.


Job Responsibilities

  • Understand the target audience thoroughly and consistently curate products that align with our customer base
  • Establish and maintain close relationships with vendors, scheduling regular meetings to ensure access to the latest samples
  • Provide clear brand strategy guidance to vendors and offer timely design direction to ensure product offerings are in line with current market trends
  • Set and achieve monthly goals for the creation of new styles, demonstrating a proactive approach to product development
  • Make informed decisions regarding product or fabric adjustments to ensure styles meet quality standards and resonate with our customer base
  • Conduct comprehensive research to stay abreast of the latest trends and developments in fabrics, incorporating this knowledge into purchasing decisions
  • Review and approve samples produced by the production team, maintaining a high standard of quality and consistency
  • Provide leadership and guidance to the buying team, fostering collaboration and ensuring alignment with company objectives
  • Facilitate weekly sales meetings with the team to discuss performance, share insights, and strategize for future success


Job Requirements

  • Bachelor's degree in Fashion Merchandising, Business Administration, or related field preferred
  • Proven experience in apparel buying, with a focus on understanding customer preferences and market trends
  • Strong negotiation skills and the ability to build and maintain relationships with vendors
  • Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret sales data and make informed buying decisions


Pay

$69,805.00 min. - $105,200.00 max annually. Bonus offered.


Benefits and Perks

  • Healthcare (medical, dental, vision, prescription drugs)
  • Health Savings Account with Employer Funding
  • Flexible Spending Accounts (Healthcare and Dependent care)
  • Company-Paid Basic Life/AD&D insurance
  • Company-Paid Short-Term and Long-Term Disability
  • Voluntary Benefit Offerings (Voluntary Life/AD&D, Hospital Indemnity, Critical Illness, and Accident)
  • Employee Assistance Program
  • Business Travel Accident Insurance
  • 401(k) Savings Plan with discretionary company match and access to a financial advisor
  • Vacation, paid holidays, floating holiday and sick days
  • Employee discounts
  • Free weekly catered lunch
  • Dog-friendly office (available at select locations)
  • Free gym access (available at select locations)
  • Free swag giveaways
  • Annual Holiday Party
  • Invitations to pop-ups and other company events
  • Complimentary daily office snacks and beverages


SHEIN Distribution is an equal opportunity employer committed to a diverse workplace environment.
